title: 1.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
Write a Java program to evaluate the number of gallons of water a cylindrical tank can hold, if the diameter of the tank is 4 meters and the height of the tank is 10 meters. Print the values of diameter and height considered, and volume in gallons after the calculations. (Consider π = 3. 14, and 1 cubic meter = 264 gallons).
[Hint:𝑉𝑜𝑙𝑢𝑚𝑒 𝑜𝑓 𝑎 𝑐𝑦𝑙𝑖𝑛𝑑𝑒𝑟 = π𝑟2h]

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
